text: Thad McClammy (born October 22, 1942) is an American politician. Born in Beatrice, Alabama, McClammy received his bachelor's degree in 1966 from Alabama State University and his master's degree from Auburn University. McClammy was in the real estate business. He is a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from the 76th District, serving since 1994. He is a member of the Democratic party.The Alabama Legislature-Thad McClammy ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People from Monroe County, Alabama Category:Alabama State University alumni Category:Auburn University alumni Category:Businesspeople from Alabama Category:Members of the Alabama House of Representatives Category:Alabama Democrats Category:21st- century American politicians
title: Thad McClammy
